store_info.title: Jugnoo Pay - UPI based
store_info.description:
With Jugnoo Pay (UPI enabled app), you can pay/send money to anyone, anytime directly through your bank account. It's a hassle free, secure and seamless payment option.

UPI (Unified Payments Interface) application is a payment system that allows you to transfer money between any two parties. UPI Application allows customer to instantly transfer money to someone else using the IMPS payment framework, without having to know their bank account number or IFSC code. All you need is their virtual identity, which could be xxxx@yesbank.

Advantages:

• Real time settlement of funds

• No need to remember or share account details

• Collect money from others

• Send money using virtual id

Steps to register:

• Create your profile

• Add bank account

• Create virtual id for linked account

• Set PIN for selected account

Here are the key features:

Surprisingly Friendly: One touch pay on the go. No tardy/cumbersome top-ups in e-wallets. No carrying debit and credit cards. Pay directly from your bank account.

Solidly Secure: Jugnoo Pay uses bank data encryption. Ensuring all transactions are fully secure with 2 Factor Authentication, 256-bit-end-to-end-encryption and SSL certification.

Lightning Fast: Make bank transfers instantly! In seconds to be precise.

Amazingly Affordable: It's free! You don’t have to pay anything to make payments. No intermediaries means lowest transaction cost for our merchants. Our merchants can now offer you the best prices possible.

Transact up to 1 Lakh per transaction (24*7). No bank holidays with us.

We are among the India's first UPI enabled apps to facilitate seamless payments to all banks from all banks. Jugnoo Pay is powered by Yes Bank.

Some of the banks on Jugnoo Pay are : Andhra bank, Axis bank, Bank of Maharashtra, Bharatiya Mahila bank, Canara bank, Catholic Syrian bank, DCB Bank Ltd, Federal bank, HDFC BANK LTD, ICICI bank, IDBI Bank Limited, IDFC Bank, Karnataka Bank, Kotak Mahindra Bank, Oriental bank of commerce, Punjab national bank, RBL, South Indian Bank, TJSB, UCO Bank, Union bank of India, United Bank of India, Vijaya bank, Yes bank Ltd.

Everyone can create Payment ID/ Virtual ID/ UPI ID/ Virtual Payment ID etc. through Jugnoo Pay.

Jugnoo Pay enables Intrabank and Interbank Funds Transfer (Mobile to Mobile, Mobile to Account) through Unified payments interface (UPI).

SUPPORT

We are dedicated to offering the best possible experience to our users. If you run into any issues or have any suggestions, please reach out to us at: support@jugnoo.in

Experience the True Way to pay with Jugnoo Pay!

Happy payments guaranteed!
store_info.short_description: Make payments to your friends directly from your bank a/c via UPI enabled app.
